title: Faculty Competency Development Academy for Transitioning to Online Classrooms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and possession of online teaching experience
context.additional_context: Learners are social science faculty members with graduate-level or higher expertise, utilizing mobile-accessible microlearning content in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Enhance online course design capabilities based on Community of Inquiry (CoI) principles by at least 80%.
Apply three mobile-optimized interaction strategies to actual classroom instruction.
Evaluate techniques to strengthen cognitive presence for fostering student engagement.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
